intro: Minuartia corcontica, commonly known as the rock白菜 or rock白菜, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Caryophyllaceae. It is a small, mat-forming perennial that typically grows in rocky or gravelly habitats. The plant produces small, white or pinkish flowers with five petals, and its leaves are usually succulent and arranged in a rosette pattern. It is found in various regions of Europe and parts of Asia, often in alpine or arctic environments. Minuartia corcontica is adapted to harsh conditions, showcasing resilience to cold and drought.
